item.title: Abandoned car with no MOT on Public Road, 16th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Hall Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Dead fox on pavement, 16th February
item.description:
Someone must have struck the fox with their car, as it's neck is broken and bloodied. Has been moved out of the road and put beside the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Plenty of potholes on the A21., 16th February
item.description:
Plenty of potholes on the A21, why is no one taking responsibility for those? And stop telling me not to report.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 111, Masons Hill, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mouldy leaves., 16th February
item.description:
Main road. Just as you turn right from the crescent SIDCUP. The whole path way is full of old rotten wet slippery leaves. Been like this for ages. I have reported several times and keep getting it closed without any action. Can they be removed as they are fangerous to walk across.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Crescent, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road surface is a mess, 16th February
item.description:
There are numerous sink holes, pot holes and ridges on the road surface. At the traffic light cross roads of East End Rd and gravel Hill where it crosses Regents Park Road. These are a hazard to cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, East End Road, Church End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavements are raised and not secure, 16th February
item.description:
Outside our house no. 60 Brookside south, the pavements have come up and when you step on them they raise the other side. Lots of water beneath them. Also have quite a few that are raised so a trip hazard especially where we have lots of young school children walking up our road to go to Monkfrith school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Ferney Road, Brunswick Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The car was parked completely incorrectly, 16th February
item.description:
